title: Facebook user share in the United States 2019 , by gender
summary: This is a bar chart representing Sex in the x axis and Percentage of users in the y axis.
The maximum Percentage of users 53.7 is found at Sex Female and the minimum is found at Male where Sex is 46.3.
The difference of Percentage of users between the highest and lowest Sex is 7.4.
min_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Percentage of users for 2 number of Sexs.
The maximum Percentage of users 53.7 is found at Sex Female and the minimum is found at Male where Sex is 46.3.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart representing Sex in the x axis and Percentage of users in the y axis.
The maximum Percentage of users 53.7 is found at Sex Female and the minimum is found at Male where Sex is 46.3.
The difference of Percentage of users between the highest and lowest Sex is 7.4.
max_summary: This bar chart has 2 columns on the x axis representing Sex, and Percentage of users in each Sex on the y axis.
The maximum Percentage of users 53.7 is found at Sex Female and the minimum is found at Male where Sex is 46.3.
The lowest value at Sex Male is 1.16x times less than the highest value at Female.
Considered together, the average Percentage of users in all 2 Sexs is roughly 50.0.
The Percentage of users is 100.0 if we add up values of all Sexs.
